title: Logging onto chat service...
body:
I don't know what to do because i have had this for a full day now and nothing is working. Please help
do i have to be like level 10 before i can make friends?

replies.body:
Issues connecting to the chat (PvP.net) service are often due to problematic network settings that conflict with League. I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that should help resolve this.

Let me know if this helped.

I also got the lol app and it says i have an error when looking for a friend
So i'm not sure if it's my account or just the game servers
